h_content_comment: This hotel is in a good location for exploring the city! The staff were so helpful and friendly! I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Hue! The room was very clean, modern and spacious- the bed was so comfortable!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is a delayed review. We stayed at this hotel at the end of August for 2 nights.
We had an enjoyable stay, although only got to know a few of the staff in the restaurant. We had 3 x Junior double/twin rooms, which were all very clean, spacious and very comfortable. The biggest during our tour of Vietnam. The bathroom was also large with good water pressure for the shower. As others have said, this hotel is down a narrow unmade road, which for us was not an issue. We felt perfectly safe at all times and, in fact, it meant that the hotel was away from the main traffic flow, so the hotel was very quiet. Breakfast was very good, both a buffet service and ordering off a menu. The citadel and Dong Ba market were within walking distance and there were plenty of nice restaurants to eat at in the local vicinity, although the hotel's restaurant was also good. A great stay! 
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Friendly staff, good spacious clean rooms. Super thick cotton bath robe & towels. Wonderful choice of breakfast. Stayed 3 nights. Many dining and eating options. 20 minutes walk to historical Citadel and local market. Highly recommended.
h_title_comment: Comfortable room, great location. Slept very well
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Stayed 2 night here alone in a romantic city - Hue, it was sad because the weather always rain but it was lovely when the Staffs were friendly and tried to make friends with me. Clean room, awesome place the enjoy the tranquil of Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
We stayed for two nights and had a very pleasant experience with the Hue Serene Palace. It definetly deserve the top ranking as everything worked out just perfectly.

Location: Top, situated in the center and in a quiet side road!
Room: clean and spacious
Staff: Alan and his team did a great job in making our stay very pleasant and even helping us with our further travel plans. Everyone was very friendly and continuously engaged.
Language: was also no problem as the staff talks good English.
Breakfast: Really nice buffet
Additional:
- Laundry service is offered by weight - not by item!
- The Hotel Restaurant - Serene Cuisine - is great and offers a really nice selection of local foods!
h_title_comment: Great Service, Great Staff, great Location!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We had a great stay here in the hotel...the staff were so nice... couldn't do enough for us! The manager also checked in with us a couple of times to see everything was ok.
In general, they were always offering assistance!!
The rooms were nice, its in a great location, lovely breakfast!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
I can't really fault this hotel at all, we had a deluxe city view room, it had a big balcony. the room was quite large, and plenty of room in the bathroom with a big shower, (careful it can get slippery).

The breakfast was wonderful, they had the basics such as fruit, bread, juice, cakes etc. laid out buffet style and you order eggs, bacon etc.

The location of hotel is down a small alleyway, but don't let this put you off, come out of hotel and turn left walk down to end of alley and then turn right and you are right in the thick of it, and in the new Walking Street area, heaps of fantastic restaurants and shops. Close to river you can wander down to the night markets etc in just a few minutes.

What makes this hotel stand out so much is the staff, WOW they are the friendliest, happiest bunch, they greet you buy your first name and go above and beyond to help you in every way they can, even if the room was average and it certainly wasn't this place would get a 5 just for the staff alone.

Well done guys...
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Cant say enough how nice it was to stay here. From the warm greeting with cool drinks and chilled fruit while we checked in, to the staff kindly attending to our bicycles by watching them during the day and bringing them into the hotel at night, there are so many nice things to say about this hotel. The room was a good size and very nice for the price. I highly recommend this hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Excellent hotel with very friendly and helpful staff. Road leading to hotel needs to be upgraded but hotel more than makes up for it. Food was really good in restaurant. Bedrooms were extremely clean. Definitely recommend this hotel. Loved our stay.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I had a very happy stay at this hotel, not far from the river but yet away from the hustle of Hue. The staff were so help and friendly, nothing is a problem. The room was lovely, airy and spacious.
Break was great too. I would definitely stay here again..
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Our days in Serene Palace Hotel was nice, nice rooms, well ubicated in the center of the town. I want to say that the best of this hotel is the stuff as far, specially Alan was so helpfull and friendly. He dedicated time to us to explain everything about the city and the services.
I can not mark with five stars our experience about the breakfast, because the coffee should be the vietnamese considering that the coffee in that country is one of the best, not a soluble coffee.
The breakfast should be better.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: For a 3 star hotel Serene Palace was wonderful. The staff were friendly and helpful and the room was brilliant! The spa bath in our bathroom was greatly appreciated after a long day of touring around Hue. Highly recommended :)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
We stayed in Emerald water hotel in Hoi An for 4 days and have to say service was amazing. Very friendly and helpful staff. We spent 15days in Vietnam starting from North to South but only Emerald water hotel deserve 5 star rating.
Thank you for making our stay in your city memorable
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
It was our first night in Vietnam.
The staff was so welcoming and helpful, and the room so clean and nice.

We also enjoyed the splendid breakfast that included many fruits and fruit juices.

We highly recommend this hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The hotel is really lovely and when I arrived I was greeted by my first name which was a nice personal touch .
The room was very spacious , comfy and lovely very clean too.
I only had one night here but wish I had another night or two as I was on a Vietnam Unique tour who source the hotel for you .
I was very impressed with this hotel.
Thankyou
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Very helpful , kind staff who did Their utmost to make the stay truly enjoyable. Special compliments to Jenny and Allan. The Tour they arranged for me similarly Well chosen, I travelled with a kind driver who talked happily on his life, a really pleasent trip to the Royal tombs was the result
h_title_comment: My Travel agent had Boogerd hue serene palace , i am very pleased with thier choice
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
We are on a Vietnam tour from Ho Chi Minh to hue and Hoi Ann, then up to Hanoi.
After coming from Ho Chi Minh city, we came to hue, we only stayed for a night but it was the nicest hotel we stayed at on our tour so far. The people that work there are amazing. Very helpful. We encountered a very nice young man named Alan. He is a lovely very happy helpful man.
Hope you enjoy.
I recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Nice rooms, quiet, very clean and well equipped (computer!, WiFi). Central location, many restaurants and pubs within a few minutes' walking distance. Personnel extremely friendly and willing to help and assist in all matters whatsoever. Good breakfast with buffet and free choice a la carte. Cheap one-day laundry facility at the reception.
Front street would need some improvement (some works are in progress already).
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled on business

h_content_comment: We are a family of three people travelling together with one teenager. Our reception at the hotel was very good, being presented with cool towels to freshen up as well as some fresh fruit to enjoy , whilst we waited for check in formalities to be completed. All the reception staff as well as porters were very attentive and friendly, being very keen to be helpful and provide information on the hotel and surrounds. The room ( junior suite) was clean, quiet and comfortable for a one night stopover. I particularly appreciated the use of a personal computer in the room. The breakfast the next morning was delicious, with an eat as much as you wish policy, instead of being limited to one meal and one drink as can be the case in some hotels.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The hotel was down a laneway and i thought omg what have I booked then we pulled up outside our hotel WOW
We were welcomed by Miss Julia, Allan & staff who were lovely, the room was very clean and the food was good
When we went out for dinner we passed the backpackers just down the laneway and they asked us to come in, we said we would call in and join them drink on the way back from dinner for 2 nights we joined them ... it was funny two 70yr olds sitting in the backpackers with young ones from various nations including Aussies all talking together.. a good couple of nights
Julia also organised our city tour (motorbike) which we loved and our guides were lovely
Thank you Julia & Staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Stayed at the Serene Palace Hotel for one night but wish we stayed more! The staff at the hotel were wonderful and helpful, giving us a map when we checked in and outlining tours and tourist attractions. The welcome drink and fruit platter was also a lovely gesture. The rooms were spacious, comfortable and overall lovely - ours also had desktop computer which was nice. The restaurant downstairs is great with many choices at breakfast and friendly staff. Loved the hotel so much I would return to Hue solely to stay at it again! Location is pretty good as well. I definitely recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Hello to all you fellow travellers. Stayed here for one night only , excellent and helpful staff , Allan and Sam looked after us really well . Great location,quite and only 5 minute stroll to riverside, beautiful room. Great shower and bathroom.Best food we have had to date . Excellent. To Australian weary travellers
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We stayed for two nights and the facilities were very well maintained. The room and the beds were very comfortable. The breakfast was very good with lots of choices. The staff were always friendly and extremely helpful. They gave excellent reccomendations for places to see around Hue and always ready to arrange things for you. Serena the receptionist, Sally our waitress Adam and little Jack were all outstanding with their customer service. We would definitely go back again and recommend the hotel to others. Serena booked us a car with driver to take us to Hoi An. He was a very good driver who spoke excellent English and had a good sense of humour. He made it clear that we could stop and sightsee wherever we wanted to.
h_title_comment: Excellent,great service and great value hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I only stayed here for one night but this was probably the best hotel I stayed in Vietnam (out of 7). Hue is small so location is not an issue. I paid £17 for one night in a superior room and got upgraded to the 7th floor with balcony and view over Hue (you can still here the roosters in the morning from the 7th floor). I would recommend this room if they have it. The staff were VERY friendly and helpful about local tours and the fruit and juice when checking in is a always a nice touch. All staff I spoke to have good English. Wifi works very well in lobby and 7th floor and there is an elevator.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We stayed one night in the hotel and it was very nice. Down a quiet alley yet close enough to walk to most places. They had some excellent recommendations on other places to eat despite being no. 1 on TripAdvisor themselves. Serena was very helpful as were all the staff. Would thoroughly recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed at this hotel in Hue for a single night as we were passing through to the The Citadel and local Tombs. The hotel was very well maintained and offered professional service and an excellent breakfast. Tina at the front desk was particularly helpful in planning our day around the city, as well as arranging transportation to Phong Nha-Ke National Park. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for good value accommodations.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We stayed four nights and we can recommend this small hotel, beds were very comfy for us and the facilities very good for the price we paid, most important was the friendliness and help of the staff they organised our tours/car smoothly I would not bother trying to book with anyone else so simple here no stress.

They even supplied a birthday cake and flowers together with the girls in the restaurant for me so thoughtful, great hotel if you are looking in the budget line, it is right in the centre of Hue off a laneway so quieter than on main streets just have to watch your step when in the laneway.

Thank you to all the girls in reception, and to Alan for his advice and help also, and to the door men who always greeted us with a warm welcome and happy to handle all our luggage.

To the owners you are lucky to have such good staff and we wish you all the very best.

Graeme and Margaret Davies
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great hotel, great location, very friendly and helpful staff. We ate dinner at the hotel and the food was what you would expect from a restaurant. Breakfast included pancakes with banana and honey as well as all the regular buffet breakfast food. No complaints whatsoever 👍
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Very nice hotel. The staff are exceptional especially the friendly personal service From all especially Alan. Rooms are beautiful. Very clean and comfortable beds. Good location. Great breakfast. A/c good.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Lovely Hotel with humble and helpful staff, they give you a warm welcome. The Hotel is very central to shops and restaurants, so it is very easy to go around hue at night by walk. Food was delicious especially their set menu. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Incredible price for such a high quality hotel. Julia in particular was a fantastic help when it came to booking tours/transport/restaurants and sister hotels for our next destination. The room was very big, clean and felt luxurious. The breakfast was lovely and the iced coffee was the best I have ever had!

If you are travelling to hue (especially if you haven't got anything planned in advance) this is the place to go!

Campbell and Lexy
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Despite being located in a narrow and under construction road, this hotel offered us a good room with a wonderful breakfast experience. The staff was very helpful and kind informing us of all sort of activities in the city. They provided us with transportation that took us to Hoi An for a very pleasant trip along the Vietnamese coast.
h_title_comment: Kind staff in a sweet hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: A very good location In Hue, close to the old quarter streets, very nice and friendly staff, a warm welcome, good city view from the higher levels, quiet place. All the rooms have computers inside and connection to the internet. Warm welcome and very good equipped room, nice furniture, nice bathroom, clean as well. Good breakfast. Strongly recommended for your staying in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: The staff are incredibly helpful and kind, the rooms are clean, elegant and comfortable and the breakfast is free and delicious! Just a few minutes walk from the Perfume River off of one of the alleys. The staff were more than eager to assist us with recommendations on where to go with the tight schedule we had and even recommended other hotels in our next destination. Highly recommendable.
h_title_comment: Superb service, beautiful and clean rooms
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The serene Palace is nestled with a series of hotels along a side street near the top end of the city in hue. About 20-25 minutes walk from the central station, its location allows you to get to and from places around the city with ease.

The staff are exceptionally helpful and were able to book us in for a nice tour going around all of the main attractions of Hue at a fair price. We stayed 3 nights and found the rooms to be clean and tidy, with the staff super courtious and friendly (especially everyone at the main reception desk and the lovely pregnant lady from the restaurant).

Reasoning behind the 4 stars is due to the AC in our room not working after several hours of it running. We went down to reception at that night, and the doorman came up and had a look at it for us. He agreed that it wasn't working after playing with the remote for 5 minutes, and left (we assumed to check for another room). He never came back! Went down to the reception again after packing our bags and they switched us to another room. New room was nice but we only were able to stay in it for one night, before we had to switch back to our existing one. Fortunately the AC was fixed for that night (It is super humid in Hue). Apologies were nice, but some form of compensation would have put this back up to a 5 star review.

Great place, well deserved high rating and your business.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
If you are looking for a great value hotel in Hue, look no further that the Serene Palace.

First and foremost, the service here is second to none. We spent 2 weeks in Vietnam in a number of hotels, and the service we received here from all of the staff was head and shoulders above - in a country with such outstanding service I hope this is the greatest compliment I can give! The staff seem genuinely interested in helping you make the most out of your stay, and will do whatever they can to be of assistance.
Communication is great - we emailed in advance and were offered a room upgrade, and replies were very prompt. The airport shuttle service was superb and efficient, with a very friendly driver and a comfortable car, complete with travel guides on the back seats! A nice touch.
The location is great - a little tricky to find down a narrow alley, but just a short walk to the central area of Hue and the main restaurants and bars.
The hotel lobby is very typical of Vietnam - meticulously clean and spacious. The room itself was very large and well presented, with nice touches such as rose petals on the bed. There was complimentary food and bottled water each day. The only comments for improvements that I would make for the rooms are to include an option for a standing shower, and also to have double beds and duvets for double rooms - our bed was two singles pushed together, complete with two single duvets! Not much of an issue but worth mentioning.
Breakfast was good - lots of choice as well as being able to order whatever you liked fresh from the menu, from eggs to pancakes.
The restaurant itself was also great in the evenings, and a perfect option if you are tired from a long day and don't want to leave the hotel.
I highly recommend the Serene Palace for anyone visiting Hue - we would return in a heartbeat when next in Hue.
h_title_comment: Great Hotel with the best service in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
One of the warmest wellcome in Vietnam, romantic atmosphere for cuples, the room it is prepared properly. My room was located above at the Last level as asqued for, great view and quiet as well. It has also a computer with direct intern acces. Very good location close to downtown, river and near/in the old quarter.
Nice and kind staff, good breakfast. Definetly recommended furthrer if Hue will be your next destination în Vietnam
h_title_comment: Definetly a recommended accomodation în Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We only stayed at this hotel one night for our short trip to Hue but found the staff to be very sweet and helpful. The deluxe room we stayed in was beautiful, clean, and had a lovely view of the city. The only drawbacks I would mention is that the air conditioning is not very strong and given the heat in Hue (compared to Saigon), it was a little uncomfortable for us. Hue is also a much smaller city so there is no Uber or Grab and it was very difficult to get a taxi (we only use the Mai Linh of Vinasun companies) when going around town. However, when leaving from the hotel, the staff can always call a taxi for you. They also arranged for a car to drive us down to Hoi An. It cost about $65USD and we could take as long as we wanted on the journey so we could stop by some beautiful places like Lang Co beach, Hai Van Pass, and Marble Mountain. The driver was great, professional, and friendly. Overall, we would recommend this hotel. Breakfast was okay. But really, the standout factor was the staff - we loved talking to them and teaching them to play ukelele! We wish each of them well.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We only stayed one night at this hotel, but we would really recommend it. Our room was big and spacious, the hotel staff was so nice and helpful. But the best was the breakfast, we could choosers much as we want, it was so delicious!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Booked based on TA reviews. Clean, spacious room with large bath and balcony. Wardrobe, but no dresser/drawers, just glass shelving holding decorative items so couldn't really unpack. Breakfast good;dinner not so much. Convenient, but closer to river would be preferable. Not that easy to find, and alley a muddy mess at times. Staff pleasant. Think they make most of money on booking excursions. Airport pickup excellent. Laundry $2USD/kilo, so pack light! Doubt you do a lot better for $27/night?
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Nice hotel in a good central location in Hue. The staff was very helpful. Nice room for the family with a small balcony overlooking the small street. Mini fridge and a desktop computer for the kids to play on. I wish the showerhead actually worked as a normal shower (not handheld) but other than that nice room. And definitely eat at the restaurant...one of the best we ate at in Vietnam at excellent prices.
h_title_comment: Great hotel. Nice location in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: I only stayed one night at this hotel but I had to jot down this review as I was so very impressed with this hotel. The reception crew, specially selling, who greeted me and attended to all my needs were so courteous and friendly .. the rooms were very attractive and comfortable and the restaurant staff wer so lovely and friendly.. specially sally. I would most definately recommend this place and it is also in the hub of the city which is perfwct. Thank you all 👍
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: After travelling for 2 months in Asia this is by far the best hotel I have stayed in. It is true they offered us a free update in our room though. Breakfast excellent, it is 100% compulsary to have dinner in the restaurant (good price and incredible food). People are so nice and knowledgable and the have affordable prices for tours.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Although this hotel is a bit far from the river itself, the price and exceedingly friendly staff make up for the slight inconvenience. The rooms are lovely, although a few don't have windows (we asked for another room for our two sons, as the first did not have windows, and they accommodated us). The staff booked us a car with driver to continue on to Hoi An, and the driver was helpful and friendly, stopping at sights along the way for just the right amount of time.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Although situated down an alleyway this hotel is an easy walk to bars and restaurants. The rooms are spacious, clean and delightful with individual balconies and the staff really like you to eat a lot of breakfast.
The cost is so reasonable for the level of service. I really cannot fault the place.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed at the Hue Serene Hotel for 2 nights. Our room was quite spacious, clean, and comfortable. We booked 2 tours with the hotel - a private dragon boat ride to the Pagoda and Citadel (over priced at $20USD) and a private car for 3 sites ($35USD - a bit steep, but, the a/c was greatly appreciated)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The hotel is perfectly located at five minutes walking (real 5 minutes) from the nightly life but in a quiet corner, while is minutes ride with motorbike (you can rent it at the hotel) from the citadel. My room (at 7th floor) was larger than standard 3 stars room very well furnished and with a fantastic terrace. Bathroom (as the rest of the hotel) was brand new, large and very well equipped with a very good shower.
A special note for the restaurant with a freshly cooked and buffet breakfast and with a fantastic menu for lunch and dinner. But what make the stay here a really perfect stay was the attitude of the smiling staff: all of the (mainly) girls working there is so kind and able to prevent your needs before you express them. Serene palace will be for shure my choose if I'll come back to Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Excellent hotel in every aspect:
The welcome complimentry is very nice and warm.
Rooms - very clean, new and well equipied.
Staff - very friendly and helpful .
Wonderful , rich breakfast.
The restuarant is very good nad as a guest you can have 10% discount there.
Location - in the center.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The best part about the hotel is the staff. They were very helpful and accommodating and wanted to make sure we had the best experience. The location was pretty good and walking distance to the main attractions. It was good for a one night stay.
h_title_comment: The staff was very helpful and accommodating!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Stayed here for 2 nights with family and had a great stay. Rooms are very nice and breakfast amazing. I never ate in the restaurant but understand it is excellent. Staff very helpful and location is great.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
As soon as we arrived we were welcomed with a cool drink and a beautiful plate of fruit.
Room lovely and spacious, breakfast nice. We only had one night and arrived late so we did not eat at the restaurant. Staff very friendly.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: An exceptional hotel where prices are incredible value for money. The rooms are spotless and are equipped with a computer. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast menu is varied, and as such caters for a wide variety of tastes. The hotel itself is very well situated, and within walking distance of most of the sites of interest in Hue. It is also surrounded by good restaurants and bars. I cannot praise this hotel any higher. Indeed I am visiting again in November and February
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Great rooms, very well located..but the best without any doubt was the helpful and lovely staff. Anything you need, they are always there to help. And the HOTEL RESTAURANT is simply amazing..great food at a very decent price..they give you 10% diacount if you are a hotel guest. Please do stay here if you go to Hue. Best place ever!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
One thing that has amazed us throughout our visit to Vietnam is despite the fact that all the shops and business' and family homes being tiny - the size of the hotel bedrooms are huge
We were on the 6th floor and had a supper room with a balcony (however at this time of year it is too hot to sit out)
Large bathrooms too - some bedrooms only have a large shower and others have a bath with a shower in it - so do specify which you would prefer.
Breakfast is a treat - eggs anyway you want and perfectly cooked - lots of fresh fruits and lovely baguette bread.
Reception and dining staff were very pleasant and helpful
Great location - down a well lit alleyway - plenty of other small hotels here too.
Would definitely visit again
It is directly across the street from the motorvino bike rental so it couldn't have been more handy for us when we hired the bikes to drive to Hoi An.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Arriving at an alleyway, my driver told me that he could not enter by car and I had to walk '50m' to reach the hotel. I thought this was very dodgy and immediately started to worry. However, after about 150m, I arrived at the entrance and from that point I had nothing to worry about. I was greeted at the door by a receptionist wo asked me to take a seat to relax and enjoy a welcome drink and fruit platter! She then came to sit next to me to give me all the information and took me to my room personally.
The room was very clean and there were even rose petals on the bed!
Except some basics, breakfast is made to order for you from a menu which is great. The hotel location is also excellent: 5 minute walk to the centre!

Definitely felt like more than 3 stars! Would return!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Large comfortable room very clean also good shower. Good breakfast in very nice in house restaurant. Sally especially friendly and helpful.
Bell boy Phong managed to mend my broken case handle same day no fuss.
Would highly recommend. Only negative is paved laneway access which is in a seemingly permanent mess.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is my very first trip advisor review...and Hue Serene Palace Hotel motivated me to write one.

I had a wonderful time at this hotel. The airport pickup was smooth. The suggested tours were amazing....I did a private motorcycle tour of the citadel and other sites in the countryside and it was great...I also did a trekking tour of bach Ma mountain which unbelievably was devoid of people...it is such a gorgeous hike!

The room was spotless and the restaurant is great. The best thing about this hotel is the friendly service of the staff...awesome! I left my little cheap digital camera behind when I left(I thought I left it on the mountain)....they figured out it was my camera and contacted me...they sent all of the pictures I thought I had lost to my email.

Highly recommended!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Super clean, comfortable, beautiful decorated rooms and amazing, smiling helpful people. They made all the difference. Breakfast and lunch is totally recommended. In the hotel's restaurant we had one of the top meals of Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We were travelling to three cities and Hue was the one we enjoyed the most! The service at your hotel is exceptional!

Extra mention and thanks to Kelly (front drsk) and Sara (restaurant). They made the stay very memorable.

Sara went out of her way to packed fruits for us for our train ride and also checked in on us whenever we were at the restaurant. We really felt welcome!

And pls pls try the restaurant food! It is amazing and reasonably priced. We had their set menu for lunch and regretted greatly not having our dinner there too. The other restaurant food cannot compare to the quality and service provided here!

Lastly, I highly recommend everyone to stay here when you are at Hue! It will most definitely make your trip memorable.
h_title_comment: Exceptional service!! Staff made ALL the difference!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The room was clean and big enough with a little balcony, the staff was very friendly and ready to help us with whatever we needed. Location wise is a little bit far but in walking distance from the main tourist areas and their restaurant was really good, we had the best nem lui in town over there.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
My wife and I stayed in many different places in Vietnam and I think this was probably my favorite because it really was the full package.

- Great staff who were very friendly, helpful and attentive to all needs or problems no matter how small
- Excellent value for money
- Decorated the room for our anniversary and seemed delighted by our response
- Didn't push us hard to make the recommendation you are reading
- Sent us a fantastic driver to collect us from the airport
- Made excellent tour recommendations
- Really tasty food in the hotel restaurant (one of the best places to eat in Hue)
- Quiet location a bit off any main roads

My only real beef?

Like most hotels in Vietnam the bed was very firm. But after 9 hotels I'd say at least 7 were worse than this....so I am not going to hold it against them.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Very nice hotel. Spacious & clean rooms, minibar, fresh fruit every day. Computer in the room. Breakfast with french bread and choice of eggs. Very friendly staff. Also enjoyed the trip we booked with their private driver very much. Very good restaurant in the hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Although we stayed for only two nights, our entire stay at Hue Serene Palace Hotel was amazing. The airport transfer was smooth-sailing. We were greeted immediately with fresh juice, fruit and smiles. They even arranged a tour for us of Hue that took place just the morning of the next day (we got in the night before!) Ngoc showed us the beautiful tombs around Hue and the imperial citadel. As we could not wake up in time to enjoy the breakfast buffet that morning before the tour, the hotel staff was so kind as to quickly pack us a small take-away breakfast! The rooms have everything from scales to umbrellas and the beds are very comfy. Although it is tucked away in a seemingly secret quiet location, it is actually quite close a very lively area filled with restaurants and bars. A 3-star hotel with 5-star service. I will definitely be staying here again if I ever find myself in Hue.
h_title_comment: Beautiful, clean hotel with amazing staff and first-class service!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel is situated in a central location down a quieter street but close to bars and restaurants. The room was a good size, clean and modern. Air con and shower both operated well. Breakfast was good. Would stay there again. Good value for money.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Definitely can't complain about this hotel, with its welcoming staff, amazing menu, tasty food and very clean facilities!! It provided everything we needed and more and if we were ever to return to Hue we would stay here again!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: My wife and I spent one night in Hue and we booked the Hue Serene Palace. When we arrived the staff greeting us with a welcome drink which is common in Vietnam. We were then given a mini fruit platter while the front desk completed the check in process. Shortly after we entered our room we were brought another mini fruit dish. These little things make for a great experience. Our room was spacious and clean. We stayed in 9 hotels during our travels and this one was the best. The value, location, breakfast, and service are top notch. A wonderful hotel for anyone staying Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We only stayed one night but the location was great, staff are super friendly, complimentary breakfast was great and our room was great with a good view. I would definitely recommend this hotel when traveling to Hue.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We stayed both of our nights in Hue here and couldn't be happier (especially for the price!). The staff are all incredible helpful with suggestions for places to see and restaurants to eat at in the city. The rooms are large, big bathroom and modern decor. It's a 25 minute walk to the Citadel, and only 5 minute walk to the hostel section of the city with a bunch of restaurants and fun bars. And to top it all off,the restaurant in the hotel was fantastic! Tons of people come just to eat that weren't staying at the hotel (which seemed odd to me until we had dinner there).

Do yourself a favor and stay here if you're in Hue, you won't find a better deal or nicer people.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed at the Serene Palace Hotel for a two night visit to Hue. I chose this hotel based on reviews I had read. And am so pleased I did. Situated right in an interesting part of Hue and down a laneways made this Hotel perfect for us. The triple family room was a great size for the four of us too. The staff were very friendly. And the restaurant downstairs (separately managed) was excellent!! I wish we had stayed longer as Hue is a beautiful city. So we will just have to go back and definitely stay at Serene Palace.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Spent 2 nights at this wonderful hotel, staff were amazing at the reception desk(cannot remember their names) and they upgraded our rooms without asking. Sally, Kelly and Sophie in the breakfast area, they made us feel special(my husband 2 friend and myself). Provided extra fruit and pancakes and whatever else we wanted. Great Great service. Would recommend this hotel to all our friends
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: I can see why this hotel is #1 on TripAdvisor. We, unfortunately, only stayed one night but it was a great experience. They organized our entire stay including a boat ride to the Pagoda and Citadel and our driver to Hoi An the next day. Our driver arrived promptly at 9am and willingly stopped en route for us to take in the local sights, eat and shop. All in all a wonderful stay and great service at a great price !!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed with Serene Palace for 9 nights, after extending our initial stay of 4 nights because we loved Hue so much! The hotel staff were more than accommodating of our requests and it was so simple to hire a motorcycle to explore Hue on our own terms. The staff were always friendly and helpful. The rooms are very quaint and cosy, they feel a bit like home. Amenities are up-to-date and the rooms are clean and quiet.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel is excellent value for money. It's centrally located with nice clean rooms and bathrooms. The staff are lovely and give you great advice about things to see on the city without being pushy. The breakfast is big with a buffet for fruit and menu for pho's or eggs. I ordered room service one night and the food arrived quickly and was very tasty. All in all, a very good hotel, highly recommended.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: We returned to this hotel and again we received the Royal service. Every staff is working every minute of their time to give you an outstanding service. The rooms are bright, well decorated and clean. The restaurant is great, the breakfast is wonderful. No need to look further, this is the best place to stay in Hue. I have been to Vietnam since 1994, I have not stayed in a better hotel than the Serene Palace.
h_title_comment: A 3 star hotel giving a 5 star service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I couldn't recommend the Hue Serene Palace highly enough.

From even before you arrive the staff make you feel extremely welcome - they organised a taxi to pick us up from the train station after a rather sleepless night train and made sure our room was ready early so we could check in straight away.

The staff could not have been more helpful in showing/suggesting where we should eat, visit and arranging our onward travel to Hoi An.

The rooms themselves are very spacious and new, very clean and importantly the strongest air conditioning we've had yet. The included breakfast was excellent - pho and banana pancakes with ice coffee plus a large range of other choices.

The hotel is also located very close to he main attractions - about a 15 minute walk across the bridge to the citadel.

If you are visiting Hue you should stay here!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Friendly staff who were very helpful organising tours and transport. A wide range at the buffet breakfast included in the price. Thank you for a great experience. Room was spacious, comfortable and clean.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Great restaurant. Great hotel. We enjoyed a lot and we will come back. Very good the noodles. Better without vegetables, or maybe with them and ask for a bowl. Exceptional the onion rings. Best place to go in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled on business

h_content_comment:
The hotel was spotless and modern. The room was good size, comfortable, and had everything we needed. The staff speaks fluent English and helped us arrange transportation and activities. They were very accommodating!

The breakfast was delicious too, but we didn't have the chance to try the restaurant for lunch or dinner. All in all, a great deal.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: My partner and I spent two nights at this hotel in Hue during a two week trip to Vietnam in June and had a very nice stay. Our flight from Hanoi was massively delayed but the hotel airport pickup that we had arranged waited for us for nearly 4 hours without complaint. At the hotel upon check-in we were upgraded to a Superior room with a balcony overlooking the quaint streets of the Colonial Quarter. The check in process itself was delightful, with complimentary fresh watermelon juice and fruit - some of the best I've had yet in Vietnam. The room itself was wonderfully equipped with complimentary toiletries, water, fruit, bathrobes, and slippers. The free breakfast was also very nice indeed although the buffet could do with a few more choices - still, Hue is a small town and the hotel did their best. The made to order eggs were excellent, especially the omelettes, as was the selection of fruit. The hotel is located about a 30 minute walk from the incredible and must-visit Imperial City, with several restaurants and coffee shops within easy walking distance so two thumbs up to this hotel.
h_title_comment: A comfortable stay with tasty food
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stopped here for 1 night on the way go to HoiAn. We arrived there already dark. Taxi went through small stays with neon sine of down town feeling, start to get a bit worried...( hotel is booked through the agent). When we arrived there, it is newy , very clean, modern kind of deco , very nice place.Room was very specie with modern bathroom . Breakfast is very nice, too. We are very happy with this place.
h_title_comment: Very nice place with new interior
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed 2 nights at the Serene Pace hotel and it was lovely. This hotel was recommended by a friend that stayed there and again we were not disappointed. Lovely big room with really good a which were grateful for as again it reached 40 degrees. The hotel booked a tour of Hue which we enjoyed despite the heat. Our guide,Hoa was great and supplied us with lots of cold water and cold facewashers which were most welcome. Also they recommended a great local food restaurant called Hanh which was marvellous. the hotel also organised a car to take us to Hoi An, which was a lovely trip and again the driver, Hai, looked after us very well and stopped at some scenic places on the way for photos. I would recommend the hotel and Tour companies without hesitation.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The staff in all hotels I have recently stayed in have been Fab and this one was no exception, they greet you so nicely and warmly that u think u r visiting a friend. Pretty functional this hotel is and the wifi was quite strong in our room. Breakfast was a huge plus - quite good might add but usually I am happy with a good egg prep. The night market or the riverside is approx a 15 min walk which is an area everyone would go to.The place was quite clean as well - thus it was a perfect stay for a night.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: From the moment I walked in the door until my reluctant departure several days later I was very impressed. Everyone one on the staff was friendly and very helpful. Upon my arrival I was welcomed with fresh fruit juice and a room upgrade! The front desk staff were very knowledgeable and were most helpful in suggesting tours, activities. Julia was especially helpful. My stay could not have been any better and I look forward to a return visit!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We cannot say enough thanks for the amazing stay we had at Serene Palace! Our stay was a bliss from the moment we landed at Hue airport to transfer to Hoi An organised for us by the hotel! Big thanks to Sophie who checked us in and helped us plan our stay in Hue! The boat experience recommend by the hotel was very unique and we strongly recommend! The transfer to Hoi An was a great road trip, our driver Brian was a fantastic guide plus he recommended the incredible place for lunch!!! Huge thanks to this hotel for the warmest welcome and outstanding customer service x
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
My staying at Serene Palace Hotel was comfortable and pleasant. The room, modern and spacious with classy decors, computer and wi-fi and other amenities offered a excellent value of the establishment. Just a simple cold towel to refresh, a glass of lemonade and a plate of fruit showed an impeccable practice for welcoming guests to the hotel. In my opinion, Serene Palace Hotel set a very high standard - with fruits and bottles water in the room.

The Eating and Dining area are well lit and clean. The menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner offered a healthy balance meal
h_title_comment: Exceptional friendly staff and comfortable establisment
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We had a lovely stay in Hue Serene Palace Hotel - staff were extremely friendly and welcoming, making every effort to ensure our stay was great. Lovely, clean room, well-decorated. Nice selection of fruits at breakfast. Would stay here again!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Well was a little surprise by the location as it was in a very narrow street .
BUt the hotel is new , the rooms are comfortable and clean.
And surprise ! Surprise! The restaurant has very staff and very good food.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The service at Vietnamese hotels set a high bar, but the Serene is in a league of its own. It started with being given fruit juice and a fruit selection on arrival. The staff were really friendly and helpful explaining about how to see the sights. Our bags were waiting in the room for us. Breakfast was a little bit different, whereby you ordered from a menu and the dish was made to order. They booked a car for us to see the tombs. They stored our luggage for us during the trip and offered us towels and a shower when we returned dripping in sweat. Before we left I ordered a cup of tea to have with a cake I bought. I tried to pay, but no, "it is free to you".

I left a few hundred thousand VND in their tip box, the first time I have done so in a hotel.

It was a great stay and comes highly recommend.
h_title_comment: The best service I have ever experienced.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
- Airport Transfer: great! Easy to set up via email and driver was right outside the terminal with a sign
- Check-in/Welcome: front desk was so sweet! Handled everything seamlessly and welcomed us with drinks and fresh fruit.
- Hotel: standard/average. Can't complain with the price for a room for 4 people.
- Hue Tour: set up a tour via email. Tour guide was awesome, showed up on time, and took us on a 6+ hour tour of Hue hitting all the main sights. Would definitely recommend this!
- Location: a bit random being down an alley but very walkable. Can get to the night market and town in under 15 minutes.
- Breakfast: buffet but you can also order things from a menu!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The room is very spacious and clean with a good city view. The bathroom is very well-maintained. The staff here are very welcoming and accommodating! They made my trip in Hue a wonderful experience. Once I told them I was planning to leave for Da Nang by train, the hotel helped me book the ticket. Definitely, recommend!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Tucked away on an alley about 5 minutes walk from the nightlife area

Spacious comfortable and clean room with a large balcony overlooking the town

Breakfast very good with great coffee

Convenient for all the attractions in Hue, just a minutes walk up the alley from the hotel is the Secret Garden bar, best G&T's we had in Vietnam and we had quite a few!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Room was spacious and clean with a lovely view of the city scape. Front office were always smiling and happy to see us, and were helpful with changing money, booking taxis and tours. They recommended an excellent tour of Hue which has been a real highlight of our trip. Wifi was generally good. The location is excellent for local restaurants, bars and small shops, but it is quite a long walk to the citadel in the heat! I would recommend getting a taxi which are very cheap.

I can highly recommend this hotel if you wish to stay in Hue; lively area, friendly staff, great room, good value.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Staff was very nice, very nice arrival welcome with fresh fruit, room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was fabulous. The entire stay was spot on. Great location nearby a lot of restaurant options.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We had a fantastic stay at Serene Palace Hotel in Hue. Upon checking in we were given fresh fruit and the most amazing passion fruit juice I've ever had. The room was beautiful and had all kinds of facilities; we especially enjoyed the shower, which was super modern with a big shower head. We also took advantage of the laundry service, as well as the great room service. Each day we were given fresh fruit and water bottles for free.

The staff is super friendly and very eager to help you explore Hue. We sat down with a receptionist who gave us a detailed map and had plenty of recommendations of where to go and what to do. But the customer service proved itself to be amazing when we were checking out early in the morning quite rushed, and the staff helped us put our complimentary breakfast in takeaway boxes, which saved us on our 12 hour bus drive. Thank you so much!

Would definitely recommend anyone staying in Hue to choose Hue Serene Palace Hotel. We had an amazing time there!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We had a great stay at Hue Serene Palace, Vietnam. We enjoyed all our accommodations in our recent trip to Vietnam but Serene Palace rates as the best. Lovely quiet, clean room with all conveniences. From our book in we were met with a plate of fresh fruit as well as welcome drink, there was fresh fruit in the room each day and the breakfast walk featured 8 different fruits, as well as home made yoghurt and creme broullie, as well as cereals, juice, tea/coffee, breads, eggs any style as well as hot dishes. The staff were pleasant and helpful. Thanks Hue Serene Palace for a great stay.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The best part of this hotel were the people! The staff is so welcoming and accommodating. We booked three rooms and they had us all together on the same floor and granted us late check-out when requested. They were helpful in providing directions and offered tour services, but without being pushy. The rooms were very comfortable, clean and air-conditioned upon arrival. The hotel is on a less-traveled side road but don't let that deter you; it's quite nice and a great value. Plus, it's within walking distance to many great restaurants, cafes and even the waterfront of the Perfume River. Many thanks to the staff that helped us feel so welcome! We look forward to returning.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
It was a great experience. The staff was very professionnal, kind and friendly. The hotel is located in quiet place near the city center. I could many place around Hue. This hotel is a wonderful choice for a stay ! Just near the hotel, they are many coffee or restaurants.
After spending a big part in Hanoi and Ho chi minh, the stay at Hue was great !
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: The hotel is tucked away in a small alley and is very convenient to walk most places.The staff were very helpful and polite as most Vietnamese people are.We stayed only for two nights but I would have been happy to stay longer.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Large Room and good sized bathroom. The breakfast was very generous with a wide variety of fresh fruit and juices. Location is not exactly great as this hotel is in a hostel alley but good enough for the value.

The hotel is generally dated and worn-out. The towels were in bad condition and the shower was not working. However, the attentive staff was helpful in fixing these issues right away.

Finally, DO NOT book the ($6) bus to Hoi An from the hotel - we were booked in a sleeper bus which has reclining seats above each other. Very uncomfortable bus ride as the reclining seats were not working and the driver was terrible. We were not given the bus description at all by the front desk staff.
h_title_comment: Good value, Large Room, Excellent breakfast but Dated hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Situated down a very narrow street and on the opposite side of the river from the citadel this is a really good value hotel. The service is superb from the welcome juices and fruit to the freshly cooked breakfast to order (on top of the buffet). The restaurant evening meals were very good too. Rooms are a good size, a few have an internal window so if that's an issue for you request an external one. Views are better above 3rd floor. We spent 2 nights here and would definitely return. The restaurant staff were just lovely. I can't name them all but Sally and her team chatted with us at breakfast and on leaving we were given fruit to take with us as they felt we hadn't eaten enough for our journey!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Friendly staff, provide excellent service to guest, they even sent email for feedback after we leave hotel.
Very informative for tour, transport and surrounding in Hue.
Room very clean and fresh fruit serve in room everyday.
Fabulous food in hotel restaurant, like their seafood fried rice very much!!
h_title_comment: A great place to stay in Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Considering how budget friendly this hotel was, we couldn't believe how much personal service you get here! The staff is all so friendly and willing to help. The rooms were spacious, clean, and comfortable, and had nice sized bathrooms.... all for around $25/night. Buffet breakfast was included in our room rate and had a nice variety of foods that included, pastries, fruit, pancakes, eggs, rice, etc. Laundry can be done here for a small fee also.
During the time we stayed here, the hotel was having a 30% off deal at their sister hotel's spa, Serene Shining. We scheduled several massages during our time here because the price was unbeatable and the spa was very professional and comfortable. It is just a short walk from the Serene Palace.
I can't say enough nice things about this hotel and the amazing service we received here!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Spacious rooms, good A/C, nice, Bathroom & hot water. Very pleasant & helpful staff. Who go out of their way to provide excellent service to their guests, good sense of humour. Great breakfast. Highly recommend for your stay in lovely city of Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: $4 taxi from station. Seems reasonably central, located on the opposite side of the river from the big market / Imperial City. Easy stroll to the night market along this side of the river. Fab room (we requested one with balcony) & from 6th floor have a bit of a view across town / the street below. Very clean & spacious room. Large comfortable bed. Desk with computer / internet, chairs with table, fruit, water, toiletries & towels provided. Staff friendly and helpful.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: A great little hotel with comfortable rooms, a very good and reaonably price restaurant and excellent breakfast. The staff is very friendly and attentive. Strange location but it didn't matter for our short stay. Really recommend it!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
They have a perfect service with cheap price, and kindly give information about the tour. I reserved Hai Van Pass tour on the way to the hotel and bed bus going to Hoi An. Hai Van pass tour wasn't cheap but there was a promotion so had a discount. The guide was very kind he even bought us coffee.
Restaurant in this hotel is also famous but haven't tried.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
The Staff were all exceptional going the extra distance to make our stay memorable.
The location was convenient , only a few minutes walk to restaurants.The room was spacious with a balcony and city views.
The breakfast was excellent with Hue special Pho
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We booked this hotel because of all the positive reviews it has received on TripAdvisor. The hotel definitely deserved these good reviews. The service is excellent, they anticipated all our needs and even drove to the train station to buy tickets for us. We were served fresh fruit upon arrival and in our room. They offered to let us shower at the hotel after our tour even though we were checked out and brought is fresh towels and soap. Breakfast was amazing with the most fruit you will ever see in one place and the ripest mangoes. I was so happy because I like mangoes and these were the best I've ever had. If you do not, they have an assortment of other fruits for you.

The location was good too, close to restaurants and night bars, and a short walk to the river too. Overall it was a great stay.
h_title_comment: Breakfast is the highlight if you Really Like Mangoes
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I can say this is a hidden jewel. They run their hotel with their guest comfort number one priority. Every request was carried out without one mistake. They whole staff is very friendly and all the ladies at reception are invaluable with their knowledge of Vietnam. Thanks for another great visit to your hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We stayed at serene palace for 1 night, wish we had stayed for more? The staff were really friendly and helpful. Special Thanks to sophie, who organised things for us, sami for being so helpful and the porter who gave me my first motor bike ride to the ATM. We took the hotel car to danang and our driver(Quoc) was very friendly and informative as we stopped 3 places on our way. The restaurant is very nice with good food. Highly recommend this place, worth the money.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Our tour organiser Lucy from Vietnam tours booked us into Serene Palace hotel for two nights during our recent trip to Vietnam in April. We were extremely happy with this choice of hotel - location was great, rooms very comfortable - in short everything was fantastic - but most of all the staff were the friendliest and went out of their way to ensure we were taken care of. A big Thank you to Si, Scarlett, Brian, Tom and Sophie for making our stay memorable. Thank you to the kitchen staff too and the excellent breakfast. If we have the opportunity to visit the beautiful city of Hue again we will definitely stay at Serene Palace and will also recommend to family and friends.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Extremely friendly and helpful staff , Si, Kelly and Sophie to name a few. Comfortable rooms with staff going out of their way to help you. Good location.

We had a early train journey to HoiAn and staff even provide us with a snack from their breakfast buffet to take. I would definitely recommend Hotel Serene.

Travellers from Melbourne
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Unlike other hotels we stayed at in Vietnam, the staff here were very eager to help, not just to sell additional services. Especially helpful were Scarlett and the driver we hired, Hai. They helped us make the most of visiting the Hue area on a modest budget. The complimentary breakfast was a good way to start a full day on a full stomach. While we got an upgrade for our night at the HSPH, our bathroom had a jacuzzi/bath with a showerhead but no place to fix it to the wall. We tried the jacuzzi but the water that came out was smelly. We told the staff about this when we checked out and they said they would fix it. They seemed proactive about improving. I would stay here again.
h_title_comment: Excellent staff, maybe the best cost performance in Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This was our favourite Hotel in Vietnam. The rooms are really spacious and we arrived to lovely flowers on the bed and fresh fruit. The staff are really friendly and daily breakfast was excellent. It is situated down an odd little road ( but that is not uncommon in Vietnam) and there are some nice bars to pop into up this little road.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The staff of the serene palace went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable, including, amongst other kindnesses:
- booking our train tickets for us at no extra charge
- providing us with a shower after we returned from a long excursion even after we'd checked out
- giving free tea to us while we waited in the lobby
- held our luggage for us all day after we'd checked out

The room was also lovely and the hotel, although found in a laneway, has a very central location to the touristy restaurant area.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: It has a great restaurant which also serves vegan food.The staff here are very friendly. It was economical. If you're vegetarian or a vegan, I personally recommend you to stay here. The staff here will help you out with the arrangements for local sight seeing
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The hotel is down a side road/track, but this helps to give a good, central location, without too much noise from traffic. We stayed in a superior room for two nights. Although we didn't have an external window, this actually didn't bother me too much (which surprises me). The room was spacious and beautifully presented, so I didn't actually miss a view. The room had free fruit and tea and coffee facilities, a large wardrobe, hairdryer, safe, mini bar and good A/C. The laundry in the hotel was as cheap as the street places ($2 for 1kg) - had just got some done previously, so didn't use this, but would have if we'd known before. The breakfast was lovely with plenty of choice, including cooked options. The hotel is well positioned, within a few minutes walk of many restaurants, shops, bars, etc. and about 10 minutes walk from the river. I'd definitely recommend this hotel and wouldn't hesitate to stay again if I returned to Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great location, very large and clean room, excellent food in the restaurant, very helpful and friendly staff, we were actually a bit sad to leave them. Very cheap for the service offered, would highly recommend!
h_title_comment: Great hotel with great restaurant and outstanding staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The lovely girls at the reception walked all the way in the heat to get me an áo dài which I now treasure. I will not forget this kindness. Their communication and friendliness is the best and the hotel is really good too. Loved the fruit platter and the food. We did not stay in Hue for long (nothing much to do really) and wouldn’t consider the hotel really central (It’s a bit inside the lane but has good places to hang out around), but we enjoyed our stay here and will recommend to anyone who asks.
h_title_comment: Great hotel, value for money, amazing staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We had a wonderful stay at this property. It is tucked away on a side street so it is quiet but there are restaurants on the street and it is walking distance to the tourist district one street over. The room looked new and spotlessly clean, the breakfast was very good, and the staff were fantastic! Nothing was too much trouble. Highly, highly recommend this property.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This was a wonderful discovery! The rooms were large and very clean and the bathroom was spotless. The hotel staff were absolutely incredible. When we arrived, I think the whole staff was there to greet and assist us! The food was very good and we noticed that a lot of people who did not stay in this hotel came here for their meals. I would definitely stay here again!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We had a wonderful experience with Hue Serene Palace. The staff was incredibly helpful. When we first checked in they went over our itinerary for our time in Hue with us. They helped us make a good plan to get the most out of our limited time there and arranged transportation for us. Their recommendations were really helpful, particularly their suggestion that we prioritize seeing Minh Mang Tomb.

Our room was very nice and clean. It was on the seventh floor and had a nice view of the city. Breakfast was complimentary and included both a buffet and diverse menu.

The hotel was in a good location, as it was a short walk to the nearby dragon boats and not far from the Citadel and the local market.
h_title_comment: Incredibly helpful staff, very nice rooms
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel is hIdden from the main streets in a quiet location. It is very clean and comfortable. We were impressed with the service and you can stay here for a reasonable price. Staff went out of their way to make our stay comfortable. The breakfast was very good and it is a few minutes walk into the entertainment area. From this location, you can take a short taxi ride to the Imperial palace. There are several options to travel to Hoi An with stopovers on the way especially as the Tombs are a bit further out. Our thanks to the staff at the hotel for their service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We decided to 'indulge' a little staying at the Serene Palace Hotel in Hue, which is still reasonably priced but a little more mid-range compared to other accommodations on our Vietnam trip. Very friendly welcome and helpful communication, our room was quiet, clean and the hotel itself is in a laneway location so away from busy streets. Didn't take advantage of the free breakfast as we chose to eat elsewhere so can't comment on the hotel's restaurant.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Staff can easily win as "Best staff of Vietnam" - when we arrived and received first complimentary cool drinks, the hostess sat with us and plan all our stay to perfection, booked as taxi, boat, rechecked all our "want-to" and "nice-to-do", recommended places to eat, to see, etc. Breakfasts were perfection too - juices, fruits, not to mention traditional Pho soups - we had everything.
And the room service and their desigh were excellent too.
Nice job, wonderful stay. Nothing to say against.
Great job guys!
h_title_comment: One of our best stays in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Of the 5 locations we stayed in Vietnam, this was our favourite. In terms of location, it was around 20-30 minutes walk to the Citadel and there were plenty of restaurants and cafes in the lane where this hotel was situated.
The staff were wonderful, they really made sure we had everything we needed. We had a small issue with our airconditioning on the first night which they fixed as soon as we mentioned it and then regularly checked with us to ensure it was working still ok.
The breakfast here was also the best we had while in Vietnam, a extensive menu to order from, and then a selection of buffet fruits, juices, pastries etc to start your day.
The fresh fruit daily in the room was also very much appreciated.
The staff also assisted us to plan our time in Hue but were not pushy at all with their recommendations.
h_title_comment: Best hotel we stayed in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We spent just one night here but we're really impressed with the hotels location, hugely helpful and friendly staff, delicious breakfast, and nice rooms.

And all very good value - perfect base for a few days exploring the city!

They also are very helpful in helping you organising your time here - giving us multiple maps, booking ideas and tour options - which were easy and quick to arrange.
h_title_comment: Great value, great service, perfect hotel!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: We spent a couple of nights as part of our visit to the Citadel and other sights. The room was absolutely top quality and great value, in the heart of Hue town. What is particularly striking is the AAA quality of the staff - every one of them is so helpful with seemingly a permanent smile on their faces. Nothing was ever too much. Food in the restaurant is fine if not particularly special. All told, the ideal place to stay in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel was extremely comfortable and within easy walking distance of the river, the market, the citadel etc. Our room was very spacious, the bed wide and comfortable and we enjoyed sitting on the balcony in the early evening with a beer. There are lots of bars and restaurants nearby, although we actually ate in the hotel restaurant on both evenings we stayed there. The staff were extremely helpful, always pleased to offer suggestions for activities and booking a driver for our onward trip to Hoi An. Highly recommended!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We just loved our short stay at the Serene Palace.Their customer service was exceptional, they were so helpful through check in and check out and in helping us with directions around town. The Hotel is really centrally located and easy walking distance to bars and restaurants, as well as a good walk to the Imperial City and markets.When we casually mentioned we were on our honeymoon they went above and beyond to decorate the room and make us feel special. they also organised a driver for us to head to Hoi An who was delightful and an excellent driver. This place is a gem!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Although this hotel is a little off the beaten path, it is well worth the effort finding it! The staff were very friendly and pleasant and the room was very comfortable and spacious. We also enjoyed eating in the hotel restaurant after a long day of sightseeing. In addition, they offered a very convenient and reasonably priced laundry service with same day service. Regarding the location, it's about a 20 minute walk to both the famous Citadel and main market across the bridge on the Perfume River. In addition, it's about a 10 minute walk to the local Vietnamese favorite restaurant called Hanh.
h_title_comment: Hidden Gem Close to Perfume River!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed 2 nights at the hotel with our 2 yr old son. It was a short trip so we were looking for something very basic and clean, a room where we would basically come to shower and sleep. This was perfect for us. We had a very pleasant stay at the hotel and were impressed by the quality of service.

The location was great. Walking distance to the busy street with all the bars and restaurants and yet not noisy.

The rooms were clean and had all the basic necessities. I only wish the air conditioning was a little better. It got a little warm in the night.

Sally stood out amongst the staff members. She provided us with personalized service and always welcomed us with a smile. I particularly appreciated her foresight into packing a lunch for our son before our long drive to Hoi An from Hue. It was an extremely thoughtful gesture and was much appreciated.

Overall satisfied with our stay here.
h_title_comment: Friendly Service, Clean Rooms, Perfect for a short stay in Hue!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We only stayed for one night at Serene Palace but all staff ensured we were delivered a great service. We arrived early at 9am and they did there best we could move into our room at 10am after a nice breakfast. Our family room was spacious and very clean. The hotel is located centrally and you can easily walk to many restaurant places or the day / night markets. Staff is very attentive and friendly. Would definitely recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We arrived at about 8:30 pm from a flight from Hanoi and WOW, what an amazing hotel. The staff were very professional and friendly and we were treated as if we were the only people there. We decided to dine in their restaurant Serene Cuisine as it was to late to go out and it was 5 star. Again the staff go above and beyond to ensure guests are welcomed and accommodated but they also engage with guests to provide that unique human connection that so many hotels and restaurants have lost. Breakfast was the best we had on our whole Vietnam tour and our only regret was that the tour only gave us one night there (in at 8:30 pm, out at 8 am) and we never got to really enjoy the hotel or the local area. Definitely a revisit is on the cards for us.
h_title_comment: What a gem hidden in a small lane way
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Staff were really friendly. They gave us great recommendations for tours. Rooms were modern and spacious. Hotel was in a great location. Breakfast was nice, you could also order off the menu. I'd definitely stay again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
As an American I would concerned about the very reasonable price of the hotel. When my wife, sister and I got there it was great. The rooms were very large and very
comfortable. The bath was large and modern. One would easily pay $150/night for the room in the US. I had been warned by other reviewers about the trip down the alley to the hotel, so I was not surprised when we made the turn. It is very conveniently located near the Perfume River. A short walk across the river takes you to the market, where you will find anything you desire. The staff could not have been more helpful. The breakfasts were delicious and filling. We highly recommend the hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We stayed for four nights and are very happy with our stay. The pick-up we arranged by e-mail worked out fine and we were greeted with cool drinks and a warm smile.

The staff is friendly and helpful, trying to accomodate every wish and one staff member even volunteered to accompany me to a store to make sure I would find it and to overcome possible language barriers! Wonderful.

We were a tad concerned about the noise because there was a bar with loud live music on our first night (Friday), but they stopped at 22 pm and the rest of the stay we slept with open balcony doors! The small street were the hotel is located is safe 100% and very quiet.

The room we had was spacious, fresh fruit was provided daily and the room was always very clear! The wood floors and the somewhat thin walls do not help with noise cancellation so depending on how considerate your room neighbours are, you might hear one thing or another, but it was never really bothersome.

The private tours (one to the Paradise Cave, one to citadel, tombs and pagoda) were all great, everybody always friendly and on time.

Breakfast was delicious, a small western buffet and a big a la carte to chose from!

All in all I can absolutely recommend this hotel, it's a great value and the helpful and nice staff the cherry on top.

Make sure to check out the Secret Lounge or bar right by the hotel. A great, relaxed and cosy place to have a drink or two!
h_title_comment: Great place to stay in Hué
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is a lovely hotel with the friendliest staff imaginable. It's located down a narrow and not very promising laneway but the rooms are immaculate and the welcome from staff was charming.
The restaurant serves excellent food.
Thoroughly recommended.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The room was very comfortable, clean, and breakfasts were very good. Location was good, close to the park and other attractions. There is a really good pizza restaurant close by and we understand the hotel restaurant has excellent dinners.
