We did not encounter any problem of any kind and enjoyed the stay very much. What we liked in particular was, that we could order what ever we wanted and how often we wanted. All in all it was the best experience with a hotel in asia.
h_title_comment: The best hotel in s e asia
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: This hotel is completely new and the facilities are beautiful!! The staff is very nice and helpful. The breakfast is good, you chose from a list but can take as many things as you like. The best hotel in south east asia so far for me. Best value for money!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We recently stayed at the Serene Palace Hotel for 2 nights and wish we could have stayed longer. The staff are all extremely friendly and helpful, especially Helen who always had a smile on her face and made us feel extremely welcome.

The rooms were nice, big and very comfortable and the bathroom also excellent, with a nice big rain shower.

This is easily the best value hotel we have stayed in in Vietnam, with the best service. Breakfast was also very good, you got to order off of a menu and have as much as you wanted.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel which you must stay at while in Hue!
h_title_comment: Easily the best value Hotel in Vietnam!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is the best value hotel I have ever stayed at.

The staff are wonderful, always giving us free drinks when we were waiting in reception, advising us on the best walking routes and helping us buy train tickets.

The rooms (even the standard) are huge, beautifully decorated, immaculately clean and very comfortable. Breakfast was good and the location is quiet yet central.

We got an amazing deal on agoda at only $16 but this hotel is worth at least double that price even in a city of cheap hotels.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Everyone of the staff was friendly and so helpful. They really did all they could to make my stay the very best. They had good recomendations. They all spoke excellent English. The breakfast was good. The room was big and very nicely decorated. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was very clean and nice. The internet was excellent. It was a good location. It's on a small alley, so its quiet! It was within walking distance of shopping and restaurants. I loved this hotel and would recommend it to everyone.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
We stayed two nights in the hotel and it was perfect!!
The location of the hotel is ideal (close to restaurants, travel agencies and shops).
It takes you about 20 minutes to get to Citadel on foot.

The room is very clean, new, the bed is very comfortable.

We have never found so helpful and nice people in a hotel.
They really make you feel at home.
Totally recommended!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel is clean, the rooms are spacious, the bathrooms are modern, and each room has its own PC with internet connection. The staff are well trained and obviously intent on providing good customer service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: very friendly and helpfull staff.the hotel is new and very clean so gives you a nice feeling.is at good location in the city but in a side street so easy to miss it.the rooms are big and is a great value for money. the personel is enthusiastic about the work and very welcoming.i would recommend the hotel to everyone
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
We booked in Serene Palace Hotel because of the price, and their pictures. It was a great decision, as the Hotel is great, and very friendly.
The rooms are big, very clean, and have a good internet-linked computer inside. The location is very good, because although at first it might seem that it is in a shady alley, the truth is that said alley is very calm, and close to the restaurants and bars, as well as a 15-20 minute walk away from the Citadel.
But the best thing about this Hotel is the super friendly and helpful staff. Upon arrival we were greeted with a delicious plate of fresh fruit and big smiles, they let us check-in way before time, and tried to help our visit to Hue in every way they could. If you have a problem, just talk to them, they will help! Especially Emily and Mary, who did the impossible to help us out, and save us time, bother, and money. There are no words to express our gratitude. Thank you!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Our stay at the serene palace hotel was fabulous, and we'd stay there again any day. You get an exceptional value for your money - the rooms are fantastic, super clean and very big. Staff is so friendly, so helpful and made our stay more than amazing. We swore we'd never rate a hotel a perfect 5/5 but this one deserves it!!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
As this is a new hotel, we booked on the strength of tripadvisor reviews on its opening offer (1/2 price rooms) and for this, the hotel is an absolutel bargain. Even at full price, you would not be disappointed.

Large rooms with flat screen TVs, computer in each room, large very modern bathrooms and we even had a balcony. The hotel is in a great location within walking distance of restaurants/bars etc. and a short cycle (or taxi ride) to the sights.

The staff were very helpful and keen to assist in arranging visits and trips. We also hired the hotel bikes and enjoyed cycling around Hue a lot. We were greated back at the hotel with cold drinks. Breakfast was also good.

Highly recommended.
h_title_comment: Fantastic new hotel - stay before rates go up!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
We were the very first guests of the hotel. So everything in our room was only just finished, the place is very modern, clean and is actually better than the European quality we are used to (!).
Every time we came back from for example: dinner, trips or just walking around in town really all personal received us very kindly and personal which made us feel real welcome.
The city is quite noisy (like most cities in Vietnam), but in the room it’s very quiet so you can get a good night rest.
Sadly enough we were only able to stay 2 nights in this nice place. To summarize: this was the best hotel we stayed in during our total holiday of over 4 weeks in Vietnam and Cambodia!
Also the quality you get for your money is super! Really highly recommended!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
I stayed in Hue Serene Palace last month and it was a good experience!!
The hotel is very new and with a good location. It is in a nice neighborhood, with a lot of bars and nice restaurants. And it is not far away from the city center and the main attractions of Hué. And they offer good tour options, with privated cars or in groups.
The staff is specially friendly and helpful, always ready to help you!!!
Very good breakfast, with too many options!
We contract an privated car with them, to go to Hoi An and I forgot my camera case in it. I contact them by mail and they sent me it to my hotel in Ho Chi Minh City without any charge. Very courteous!!!
It was a very good experience, I recomend it!!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We booked the Serene Palace Hotel based on trip advisor reviews.
When we arrived, we were welcomed by friendly and informative staff and a welcome drink.
The room was very clean, bed comfortable and new quiet A/C units.
Breakfast was very good with "order from the menu hot food" (no limit in how much you can order), fresh fruit and nice coffee. The staff encouraged us to order more food from the menu as they said "it makes us happy if we enjoyed and liked their food".
After we checked out, we had an 8 hour wait for our night train, however the hotel let us keep our backpacks at the hotel, use their push bikes for free and when we returned from our day of exploring on the bikes, allowed us to use their shower before we boarded the train.
All staff spoke good English and were very friendly.
One tip, is that the place can be hard to find initially as it is down a side alley off the Main Street. Their is a small hotel sign at the end of the alley way (similar to a street sign size) which can be easy to miss!.
You will not be disappointed if you stay here.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
My stay at Hue Serene Palace Hotel was perfect.
The room is modern and perfectly clean, with a computer and a nice TV.
The staff is very friendly, ready to help. We also had a perfect continental breakfast that we will remember.
Serene Palace was a wonderful place that i highly recommend
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Stayed in Serene Palace for just one night in Hue in August.
On arrival we were greeted with cold flannels, a plate of fresh fruits and cold juice - just what we needed after a long sweaty bus ride.
Very friendly staff who provided all the information we needed for the city, tours and travel arrangements.
Spacious, modern, clean room. Computer in the room with internet was very convenient.
Excellent breakfast with pretty much all we could eat and drink made to order.
Would definately stay here again
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This was the best stay in Vietnam and also in Europe/America ever for us. The staff was so friendly and helpfull, the breakfast was more than oké. The hotel is new and very clean. In the area around the hotel there are a lot of very nice restaurants. In the room you hear no noises. You can walk to the citadel in Hué from the hotel. They arrange everyting for you at reasonal prices, like laundry, busses and motorbikes
Extra, if you come to Hué rent a motorbike and drive to the beachbarhue. This is the best beach bar we stumbeled over in Vietnam. The beach is cleam, the food is nice and total is very exotic over busy. By pass the Thuan An beach for 1,5 km
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here in August 2013. People have been super friendly with us in helping us arranging a visit to the monuments and giving valuable suggestions to the restaurants
More than that the room: very good. nice, clean, wide. when you arrive from the small road that leads there you might expect that this time you had bad luck, but you didn't have it. You can understand it from the very first step you put in the hall.
A fantastic place for a short journey(it is what Hue requires for a visit).
Absolutely suggested
h_title_comment: Super hotel and very friendly staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed here for 1 night and paid $20 thanks to the opening promotion. We got a large, clean well equipped room with a small balcony. This was awesome value. The staff work really hard. Our pick up from the train station was seamless. I loved that along with a welcome drink, the staff gave you a map which explained where the hotel is, where the city center is and where most tourist attractions are located. It is a bit of a walk from the city center but i found it acceptable. The mini bar is also reasonably priced - same as most convenience store prices. I am not sure how much value-for-money this hotel will be when the normal prices kick in. But for the moment, this is the best place to stay in Hoi An.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed here when it had only been open 17 days. Exceptionally accomodating staff - very friendly and helpful. Room was lovely. Very clean with our own in-room computer and a balcony. Stayed only one night but would love to have stayed more. Highly recommended.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed there in July 2013 for 2 nights!!! Brilliant service. Excellent rooms!! Very helpful and friendly staff. Great location!!! Even got a welcome breakfast hours before check-in time!!!! Absolutely recommend it!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Fantastic value here. A brand new Hotel with some of the nicest staff you will find anywhere. The hotel is well located and we found it easy to get around. Really nice rooms, a pleasure to escape to from the heat! We also had a large balcony with city views.
It was a lovely stay and we definately highly recommend it.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The best hotel we have during our trip in Vietnam.
Friendly and expert staff, pc in each clean, spacious and confortable room, delicious breakfast, very good value for money.
They offered us breakfast even before the check in. Good position near shops and restaurants
Absolutely recommended.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I wish I could give this hotel a higher score than just excellent, it really was fantastic. Upon arrival we were greeted by smiling staff, given glasses of lemon squash and given a detailed run down of what there was to do in the city by a lovely girl called Emily. We stayed in room 702 which was on the top floor and had a beautiful balcony with city views. I was blown away by the room, the bed was huge and so comfy, the bathroom was amazing, the shower in particular was lovely and hot, everything about the room was perfect - with really nice touches like complimentary fruit, tea, coffee etc and a computer to use. Breakfast was brilliant too, I had the best scrambled eggs I've had in a long time (probably since leaving the UK) and with loads of fresh fruit available again you cant go wrong. The staff are so sweet always saying hello with a big smile, asking if you slept well etc. I just hope that when the prices eventually go up they don't get overrun with nit-picky rich tourists because they are doing such a fantastic job already!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here for 2 nights in early August 2013.

Hotel has been open for around a month - a lovely stay. Staff are very very friendly. I mean cant help you enough friendly.

Rooms are very good quality - Nice touch putting a computer in the room.

well located for the Citadel and restaourant / bar area.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This was by far the best hotel we had during our 4 weeks in Vietnam. At the moment we closed the doors of our taxi, three or four young men helped us with our luggage, once inside the hotel we were invited to sit down and have some fresh fruits and fresh fruit juice. Our room was spacious, we had our own computer in the room and the bathroom was nice too.
But what made our stay in Hue so special was the very nice and obliging staff and the delicious breakfast: Fresh fruits, fresh juice, a lot of different options to choose from and if you are still hungry, it is no problem to get some more.
We were benefiting from a special offer on agoda, but what we got for our money was worth a whole lot more.
h_title_comment: Best service we experiencend during our stay in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I was in the hotel only one day, but even so short stay was really wonderful!great service, individual orientation, very pleasent welcome fruits, clean big rooms and staff is always ready to help (when I had problems with safebox and choosing sightseeing route). I recommend Serene Palace - brilliant service for such low price!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: It is a brand new hotel in town. The room is clean and new with excellent hot water supply and soundproof. The staff are super passionate and helpful. We were amazed by the all-you-can-eat breakfast provided with a fruit bar for your selection.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: I am so thanksful to the staff and the manager who allowed my vietnamese friends who came from a far remote village in quang tri province, to stay in may room for the last night before flying back to europe, as the hotel was fully booked. all of them pampered us with everything one can wish. my friends never has entered a hotel before. once in their lifetime they came to know what their home country also can be: most friendly, most clean, most delicious, most attentive. I'm proud of this great favor and want to say once more: cam on!!!! I will recomend serenca palace hotel to every traveller - it deserves the name PALACE. please continue like this and you will be number one in hué! (miss you already, means I have to come back soon!)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Everything's great for staying in Serene Hotel. The staff know what we want. Cheap and got service like a 5 star hotel. They welcomed us with fresh fruit, fresh juice and wet towel after a long journey (almost 16 hours) from Na trang by bus. The room decorated with brand new furniture and clean, equipped with PC and strength WIFI. The breakfast was delicious and you can eat as much as you want. The hotel is not too far from main road. The staff really helpful, they gave us colorful map included info about some landmarks in Hue and fee entrance. All staff can speak english fluently. They're really helpful and friendly. I think this new hotel deserved get excellent rate.
h_title_comment: Feel like stay at 5 star hotel with friendly price
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Serene hotel has been the best place we have stayed at in Vietnam. Having just opened, this hotel is very clean and the staff are extremely friendly, enthusiastic and helpful. We got free drinks whenever we needed. Would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the not so lively town of Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Although I paid a promotional rate while staying here, I think this hotel will offer amazing value even once that deal has concluded. The rooms are incredibly clean and well-appointed, and the beds are very comfortable. The WI-FI was solid, the breakfasts were delicious, and the staff couldn't be more pleasant and helpful. A special thanks to Mary and Catina at the front desk for all their advice. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel, and the many other positive reviews are a testament to that. It's a really great choice for your visit to Hue.
h_title_comment: Five star service on a budget
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Beautiful new room with everything you need! Super-friendly staff. Bicycles for rent, great breakfast. Slightly out-of-the-way but I would happily have paid much more for this hotel .. best-value hotel I've ever stayed in.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Beautiful rooms for this price. Mary on reception was so helpful with our onward trip planning. All staff were very friendly and enthusiastic. Would definitely stay again. It was good idea to take a taxi to find this as it is 100 m down a side alley.
h_title_comment: Lovely new hotel with really friendly staff
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Serene Palace went above and beyond our expectations. The included breakfast was so delicious and unlimited! The staff treated you with such care and consideration. Location is perfect and room were clean, cozy and everything was brand new. They are handling themselves like a 5-star hotel at a fraction of the price.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
This is a new hotel that prides itself on customer service. If anything the staff can be too friendly and after a 12 hour night bus you can sometimes just want to be left alone.
This is not a criticism as they serve you free drinks (ice tea etc) if you happen to be waiting for any length of time In The lobby. They even let us have breakfast on the day we checked in and readied our rooms early (9.30am) which (although ordered off a menu) was unlimited of you are still hungry.
This hotel will do well if it continues to offer the same service for its guests as we experienced.

Excellent rooms, wonderful bathrooms, great location.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
First of all, I would like to thank Serene's staff for having welcome me.
The room is clean, the staff are helpful, and well located so that we enjoy our valuable time for worth.
Hope I can come again some other time..
Good luck..
h_title_comment: Serene Palace is a good choice for staying at Hue
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
Lovely hotel, friendly staff, very clean, good breakfast.
Staff does everything to make you feel at ease. When we left Hue we came to the conclusion we forgot something in our hotel room. They were very understanding and made sure we got it the next day in Hoi An. Thank you for this!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great staff, huge rooms with computer in every room. Good breakfast. Hue is a nice city and near the hotel are many nice ans cheap restaurants... Definitly the best hotel we've been in vietnam, the stuff was so helpfull and nice and the rooms we're amazing dor this prize.
h_title_comment: We've been travelling four weeks through vietnam and it was definitly the best hotel we've been.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Amazing service: extremelly friendly staff with really good english and even some french! The breakfast service is really good with fresh juices and fruits and toast and dishes all included in the room price, a brand new high standard hotel with very soft prices. Probably one of the best address if you look for somewhere cheap but classy and really comfortable. Computers in the bedroom with internet free, large bedrooms with view on the town, very well furnished and decorated with taste: I strongly recommend this place and would easilly come back here!
h_title_comment: The best service ever in a brand new hotel in the heart of the town
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We had such a good time staying at this brand new hotel. From the front counter receptionists to the kitchen staff, everybody all the time is genuinely sweet, friendly and open... The room is clean, spacious & nicely decorated, but my daughter & I felt completely at home and relax mostly thanks to these girls and boys working the floors. They're still working on finishing things up (our curtain was taken away while we were there in our room for fixing, the breakfast menu isn't fully available...), but we can just oversee these little things and enjoy our stay. I just love them, and been recommending it to other travelers we cross paths with!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The hotel is lovely, much higher quality than the places I am accustomed to, clean, and comfortable. However, it was the staff that made the experience one I will never forget. They were just so friendly, ridiculously friendly in fact. We immediately felt welcome, relaxed, and happy to be talking with such nice people. On top of that, they went to great lengths to help in any way they could. I would strongly recommend staying here.
h_title_comment: Friendliest hotel I have ever been to.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We were extremely well greeted at this small hotel situated in a calm alley in the city of Hue. The bellboy saw us arrive in the alley and ran to help us with our bags and brought them for us inside the hotel. We were welcomed by smiling employees who offered us a nice welcome drink and a plate of fruits! While we were relaxing with our drinks, someone came to see us to provide us with a map of the city showing us the main attractions and giving us insights on great restaurants in the area. They even gave us the name of some local dishes that they thought we would enjoy trying! THIS IS SERVICE! We were then shown to our lovely room (pretty new and very clean might I add) where we had free water bottles, coffee and iced tea. The breakfast was great: nice selection of fruits, juices, coffee and tea and you could have pancakes (banana, honey, chocolate), toasts with jam and butter, eggs as you like them with bacon, ham or a typical Vietnamese breakfast - yummy! A special thank you to our 2 new friends Cathy and Julia - those are their nicknames for the guests...again everything to make our stay extremely pleasant :)
h_title_comment: AMAZING small hotel in Hue - Top of the line service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Highly recommend staying here. On arrival we were given a plate of fruit and a glass of fruit juice each time we got back to the hotel.
Good rooms with really comfy beds, great breakfast and fantastic staff. We were able to shower after checking out, before taking an overnight train.
The service could not have been better. Amazing value at their special opening rates.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Amazing stay in this brand new hotel, 2weeks old I think. The least expensive hotel at e10 a night and definitely one of the best I've ever stayed in. Staff were fantastic, so pleasant, friendly, eager to please and really enjoyed talking to and it seemed getting to know the guests. On arrival we were given cold drinks,cold towels and fruit.Given a map and recommended certain restaurants and tours but in a friendly as opposed to a pushy manner.Rooms were beautiful, good size and very clean. Bathroom sizeable and clean-no shower curtain yet but I'm sure it will be installed, wasn't a problem!Location of hotel is very close to restaurants, bars etc though is down a small lane and at present it seemed people around the area including taxi drivers knew it as the "new hotel" but is not difficult to find. During our stay they were paving outside and when we woke at 9, there was drilling outside but I imagine it will be finished in a week or so and will be fabulous. Breakfast was cooked fresh as you order from an extensive menu where no request was a problem, just fantastic service! For such a reasonable price and a fantastic place it is certainly a hotel that shouldn't be overlooked!!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Our family of 5 stayed on night at the Serene Palace Hotel. The staff were very keen to help and to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. It is located in a quieter street, the rooms were large and brand new. The bathroom and shower were of a good size and the wifi worked well and there was a PC in the rooms. Their recommendation for a restaurant for dinner was spot on and they organised a car and driver for us to travel to Hoi an the next day. We enjoyed our stay in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We stayed one night at Serene Palace hotel with our family. The staff is really friendly and always ready to help. The bedrooms are really huge, clean and comfortable, all furniture and equipment being brand new. I have only one regret, there were no room available for our second night in Hue. One thing is sure, if I come to Hue again, I will definitely book a room in this hotel.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Super friendly and motivated staff, very large and clean rooms. the hotel just opened in july 2013, so everything is brand new. large fruit buffet for breakfast. we paid 12 $ for a giant room with ac, tv, fridge and bathtub. highly recommended!!!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: The room was new and clean with a wide window and a nice balcony. The staffs were also very kind and friendly. Wi-Fi was available in the room along with a Desktop PC installed in the room for faster internet access. The hotel also provided tour service to see the tourist attractions and also have arranged a transportation to our next destination. If we have another chance to visit Hue, we would definitely stay at this hotel again. We strongly recommend this hotel to all the people who are planning to visit Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: When we arrived at the hotel we where welcomed by the very friendly staff providing us some fruit, lemonjuice and coffee. We stayed in te period that the rooms where 50% off, but for full fare still a good deal. Staff is the biggest plus and everything is spacious and brand clean!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: I came back Vietnam with my family. We visited Hue 3 days and stayed at Hue Serene Palace Hotel in 2 nights on 21st of July. Branch new hotel, just opening. Rooms are so nice, quiet, clean, modern and well done furniture. Location is in the center of Hue, just few minutes walk to Perfume river. All the staffs are so nice, friendly and helpful. Highly recommendation to everybody want to visit Hue. I my self absolutely will come back here and stay again. Thank you so much for very good service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Hello everybody, we are a young Dutch couple ẽxploring beautiful Vietnam. The Serene Palace Hotel is brand new and cheap. The staff served us greatly, providing us directions, scooters and travel options to Hoi An. The rooms are clean and spacious and the breakfast is wonderful. I would definitely suggest this hotel to every kind of traveler, from low budget until high range. So much bang for your buck at this place!
h_title_comment: One of the best hotels in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great service, room and everything. Strongly recommended for anyone who wants to visit Hue. Definitely I will stay here again next time. The staff is friendly and speaks good English. They provided a map for us with suggested places.Thank you to all lovely staffs and hotel manager.
